text: She was engaged to Nigel, had been for two years. Sometimes they talked on the theme of "when we get married', and then all was wonderful, and perhaps it had married, old girl, you'll have to stop that lark, I can tell you! a slip of the tongue when Nigel had said, only last that lark, I can tell you!
